10 float freq = 1;

12 YAML::Node load_config(string file)
13 {
14  YAML::Node config;
15  try
16  {
17  config = YAML::LoadFile(file); // gets the root node
18  }
19  catch (YAML::BadFile bf)
20  {
21  ROS_WARN("No configuration file found, a new one will be created");
22  config = YAML::Load("");
23  }
24  return config;
25 }
26 
27 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
28 {
29  string source = argv[1];
30  string target = argv[2];
31  string ref = argv[3];
32  string frame = source + "_" + target;
33  string frame_yaml = frame;
34  if (argc > 6)
35  {
36  frame_yaml = argv[4];
37  ROS_INFO_STREAM("tf name in YAML file changes to " << frame_yaml);
38  }
39  string node_name = "publish_" + frame;
40 
41  // Initialize ROS
42  ros::init(argc, argv, node_name);
43  ros::NodeHandle nh;
44 
45  std::string path = ros::package::getPath("calib");
46  string file = path + "/config/transform.yaml";
47  YAML::Node config = load_config(file);
48 
49  // ROS loop
50  static tf::TransformBroadcaster br;
51  while (ros::ok())
52  {
53  tf::Transform transform;
54  float tx = config[frame_yaml]["tx"].as<float>();
55  float ty = config[frame_yaml]["ty"].as<float>();
56  float tz = config[frame_yaml]["tz"].as<float>();
57  float rx = config[frame_yaml]["rx"].as<float>();
58  float ry = config[frame_yaml]["ry"].as<float>();
59  float rz = config[frame_yaml]["rz"].as<float>();
60  transform.setOrigin(tf::Vector3(tx, ty, tz));
61  transform.setRotation(tf::createQuaternionFromRPY(rx, ry, rz));
62 
63  br.sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(transform, ros::Time::now(), ref, frame + "_filtered"));
64  br.sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(transform, ros::Time::now(), ref, frame));
65 
66  ros::Rate loop_rate(freq);
67  loop_rate.sleep();
68  }
69 
70  return 0;
71 }
